# PKToolPickerEraserItem

**Class**

An item that represents an eraser tool in the tool picker.

## Declaration

```swift
class PKToolPickerEraserItem
```

## Overview

An eraser item represents a [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKEraserTool-swift.struct] — a tool for erasing content in a canvas view — in a [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKToolPicker].

## Creating an eraser item

- **init(type:)**: Creates a new eraser item.
- **init(type:width:)**: Creates a new eraser item with the specified width.

## Accessing the eraser tool

- **eraserTool**: An eraser tool for erasing parts of a drawing.

## Creating a tool picker

- **init()**: Creates a new tool picker with a default set of tools.
- **init(toolItems:)**: Creates a new tool picker with the tools you specify.
- **PKToolPickerInkingItem**: An item that represents an inking tool in the tool picker.
- **PKToolPickerLassoItem**: An item that represents a lasso tool in the tool picker.
- **PKToolPickerRulerItem**: An item that represents a ruler tool in the tool picker.
- **PKToolPickerScribbleItem**: An item that represents a Scribble tool in the tool picker.
- **PKToolPickerCustomItem**: An item that represents a custom tool in the tool picker.
- **PKToolPickerItem**: The base class for an item in the tool picker.

## Inherits From

- PKToolPickerItem

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
